name: FAILSTATE (WIP ver1.0.2)
description:
Controls:

Move: Arrow Keys

Shoot: Z

Shield: X

Pause: Escape, Enter

A little work in progress bullet hell game I'm making. You play as a little alien taking on the forces of other invading aliens. 

The game just ends after the first boss fight right now. I might make a "you win" screen later if I have time. My plan is to update this game over time.
